      • toIndices

        public int[] toIndices(String s)
        Returns the indices corresponding to the argument characters.
        Parameters:
        s - the characters
        Returns:
        the indices corresponding to the characters s
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - unless every character in s is a character in this alphabet

        Returns the character corresponding to the argument index.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - unless index is between 0 and R - 1
